name: Rapidmon
effect: [When Digivolving] If you have a green Tamer in play, suspend 1 of your opponent's Digimon.
digivolve_effect: [Your Turn][Once Per Turn] When an opponent's Digimon becomes suspended, this Digimon gains ＜Security Attack +1＞ for the turn. (This Digimon checks 1 additional security card.)
